previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Vancouver Whitecaps | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 1, Vancouver Whitecaps 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A pair of Western Conference clubs which opened their new seasons on winning notes meet to round out Week 2 as Chivas USA play host to Vancouver Whitecaps FC on Sunday afternoon in Carson. Chivas USA got their new beginning off to a good start in a 3-2 home victory against the Chicago Fire.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs. Vancouver Whitecaps

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Stunning shot from Manneh is saved by Kennedy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Manneh scuffs clear chance on goal

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Andy O'Brien (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Thomas McNamara (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 7': Whitecaps FC showing their speed and fitness on the field! They're relentless with their pressure, but still no real threats.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).
Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA's strikers are starting the game tight with the midfield. Don't know if they've been told to defend, or are conserving energy.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Erick Torres (Chivas USA).
Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Luis Bueno
timelineItems.text: Working on a Sunday afternoon. #chivasusa #mls #lifeinthepressbox

timelineItems.desc: Agustin Pelletieri (Chivas USA) is shown the red card for fighting.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Pelletieri sent off for a hard tackle on Morales

timelineItems.name: Runnin' w/ the Devil
timelineItems.text: What do I do to follow up a frustrating draw with Chicago? Watch #CHVvVAN on TV, of course. I’m sure this will cure everything. #MLS #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: 11' Pretty chippy affair. Both teams not planning on contending for this week's fairplay award #chvvvan #Mls

timelineItems.comment: Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: After 10 minutes of nothing from both teams, good idea and timing between Miller and Mattocks. Miller just overhit the pass.

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Vancity Footy Fan
timelineItems.text: Red? #VWFC #Chivas

timelineItems.name: Residualimage
timelineItems.text: RED CARD!!! WOW #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Haha.. Wow. That's pretty harsh. Red to Pelletieri. #chvvvan #mls

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: That was an extremely harsh red card. #chvvvan

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: No intent by Pelletieri, but you can't step down on an ankle like that. I think it's a deserved red. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Das Fro
timelineItems.text: No, that's a red. Just a question whether or not the ref wants to give it. This one did. #MLS #WhateverTheChivasHashtagIs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: RED CARD (13') - Straight red to Agustin Pelletieri. @CDChivasUSA down to 10 men vs. @WhitecapsFC. http://t.co/vAULs9tUKF #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Thomas McNamara (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 8 - @WhitecapsFC have lost just once in 8 @MLS meetings with @cdchivasusa (3W 4D). Matchup. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: For today only, the blackout has been lifted for the #VWFC match on MLS Live across Canada.

timelineItems.name: Lupe
timelineItems.text: Representing O-High at Chivas USA game. Mascots to play at half. #chivasusa #mascots #ohs http://t.co/JnCh6OXoKw

timelineItems.text: Representing O-High at Chivas USA game. Mascots to play at half. #chivasusa #mascots #ohs http://t.co/JnCh6OXoKw

Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.text: Less than 20 minutes to kick off! | Estamos a menos de 20 minutos del arranque del partido http://t.co/ZcbGFqoaUm

timelineItems.text: Less than 20 minutes to kick off! | Estamos a menos de 20 minutos del arranque del partido http://t.co/ZcbGFqoaUm

timelineItems.name: carlos garcia
timelineItems.text: We are here going 2 see my 2nd #chivasusa game #StubHubCenter

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - @WhitecapsFC won just 2 of their last 9 road games in @MLS 2013 (3D 4L). Test. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: I'm here at StubHub Center, getting ready for the Chivas USA game. It is hot today!

timelineItems.name: Andrew Ngo
timelineItems.text: O'Brien with a yellow. Both guys went for the ball. Ref seems to be card happy. Dangerous free kick for #ChivasUSA coming up. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.text: Alineación de @WhitecapsFC: Ousted; Beitashour, O'Brien, DeMerit, Harvey; Reo-Coker, Laba; Miller, Morales, Fernández; Mattocks #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.text: Ambos ganaron la semana pasada, ahora @cdchivasusa recibe a @WhitecapsFC ---> http://t.co/dlFDZ4gjhN #CHVvVAN http://t.co/fLzBpqlJ0A

timelineItems.text: Ambos ganaron la semana pasada, ahora @cdchivasusa recibe a @WhitecapsFC ---> http://t.co/dlFDZ4gjhN #CHVvVAN http://t.co/fLzBpqlJ0A

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - @cdchivasusa have won 3 of their last 6 home games in @MLS, dating back to last season. Upward. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: Teams have taken the field... Kick off in minutes... | Los equipos ya se encuentran en la cancha... Arrancamos en solo minutos

timelineItems.name: Julian Dierkes
timelineItems.text: Teibert not in starting XI is sign of depth at #VWFC, but still... too bad.

timelineItems.name: Alexis Carpenter
timelineItems.text: Congratulations @christiandean22 on cracking the @WhitecapsFC 18! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Eddie Magana
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA vs Vancouver Whitecaps! Let's go red and white! �⚽️�� #chivasusa #fearthegoat #yearofthegoat #win #mls

timelineItems.name: Jorge Morales
timelineItems.text: Let's go goat #CHIVASUSA #blackarmy1850

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Agustín Pelletieri (Chivas USA).
Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Eric J. Kekeis
timelineItems.text: I have a feeling a lot more cards and controversy are in line for this #CHVvVAN match.

timelineItems.name: Julian Dierkes
timelineItems.text: Wow, ref, that foul on Fernandez looked like it was worth making a call, more than red/yl cards! #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro Morales.
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Darren Mattocks tries a through ball, but Pedro Morales is caught offside.
Match ends, Chivas USA 1, Vancouver Whitecaps 1.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #VWFC prevent ultimate embarrassment - where was the side than smoked #RBNY? #ChivasUSA have something they can build on - well earned point

timelineItems.name: Andrew V Watson
timelineItems.text: 2 games, 4 points? I'd bite yer hand off. #ChivasUSA @cdchivasusa

timelineItems.name: Andrew Ngo
timelineItems.text: Manneh salvages a point for #WhitecapsFC, but they have to be disappointed in that performance. 75+ min 11 on 10 but can't capitalize #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Jay Lahm
timelineItems.text: Only second game for Robbo in charge. Good chance to see how the team reacts to a terrible performance! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer

timelineItems.desc: A pair of Western Conference clubs which opened their new seasons on winning notes meet to round out Week 2 as Chivas USA play host to Vancouver Whitecaps FC on Sunday afternoon in Carson.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs Vancouver Whitecaps | March 16, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: This kid is something special. Watch Kekuta Manneh's game-tying goal for @WhitecapsFC. http://t.co/8eI7Ltbdv6 #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: This kid is something special. Watch Kekuta Manneh's game-tying goal for @WhitecapsFC. http://t.co/v5Srt4Zysi #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: This kid is something special. Watch Kekuta Manneh's game-tying goal for @WhitecapsFC. http://t.co/bMV9heOLPK #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Andrew Ngo
timelineItems.text: Morales taken down in the box, but no call. May have been a makeup call for that straight red. That looked more like a foul than red. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Obviously, the Pelletieri red card changes the plan for Chivas, which you have to figure will be to bunker as long as possible.

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Fernandez and Morales looking more lively now. Game opening up a little. 0-0. 21st.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Thomas McNamara.

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: Oh my - that ball from Morales to put Fernandez in for the 'Caps was pretty. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: I think Lochead just got away with an elbow there on Kenny Miller. #chvvvan

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Pedro Morales tries a through ball, but Kenny Miller is caught offside.
Foul by Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Todo en Deportes
timelineItems.text: Vancouver sin leveron empata 0-0 en 23' con Chivas USA #MLS

timelineItems.name: BOTNSoccer
timelineItems.text: Chivas still having decent possession despite being a man down. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: 25': Morales almost replicating his assist to Miller last week. But Miller just caught offside... Very close call. Still tied at 0.

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Well, Dani Fragoso will get a start next week. Guess it's a good thing Chivas got both him and Pelletieri in the offseason.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #vwfc running off the wrong passes, going offsides, chipping the ball to Dan Kennedy #mls #chvvvan

timelineItems.name: Kimberly
timelineItems.text: Leeeets goooo #chivasusa

timelineItems.name: Wet Coast Life
timelineItems.text: #Canucks comeback and win in shoutout. Now miniMe, the dog and I are waiting for #WhitecapsFC kickoff against #ChivasUSA. Go Caps! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: I don't think I like Miller so far from goal. Would prefer he not try to hold ball up from wings. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Sloppy stuff from Caps in own end. Finally get out. This half has been brutal all around.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martonik
timelineItems.text: Not sure how VAN are being put under such pressure by a 10-man CHV right now. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Sebastian Fernandez tries a through ball, but Darren Mattocks is caught offside.

Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Andy O'Brien.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Hildebrandt
timelineItems.text: This is a markedly different #VWFC team from last week. Lacking tempo and impetus. Pick it up, boys!

timelineItems.text: good punch by Ousted on #ChivasUSA corner - he was at fault for not dealing with #RBNY cross on 1 goal conceded last week #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Andrew V Watson
timelineItems.text: 1st half corner. Where is Dan Kennedy? Sweeping up on the halfway line thats where. Love it. #ChivasUSA @cdchivasusa http://t.co/zKSZECU3lZ

timelineItems.name: Andrew V Watson
timelineItems.text: 1st half corner. Where is Dan Kennedy? Sweeping up on the halfway line thats where. Love it. #ChivasUSA @cdchivasusa http://t.co/zKSZECU3lZ

timelineItems.text: #VWFC #ChivasUSA wherever that supporters group is at stub hub, they make it sound like that place is packed. Well done drummers

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Well, guess I'll start writing my "substitute Manneh lifts Caps to victory over 10-man Chivas" story.

timelineItems.name: s.E~B, militant
timelineItems.text: It's like it doesn't matter that we're up one player. #VWFC #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Leandro Barrera with a cross following a corner.
Attempt missed. Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.name: Ivan
timelineItems.text: I hope that this slow start from @WhitecapsFC is purely tactical. Second half we must dominate. #MLS #Whitecaps #Chivas

timelineItems.name: Seth Vertelney
timelineItems.text: What happened to that Vancouver team from a week ago? #MLS

timelineItems.name: Russell Arbuthnot
timelineItems.text: Man, this is sloppy, sloppy, sloppy stuff from the Whitecaps. Just ugly. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: That seems about fair. Reo turns it over to Rosales. He finds Torres, who smacks his shot off DeMerit's bum and in. 1-0 just before half

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #Chivas deserved a goal for their domination being down to 10 men - should be a serious wake-up call for #VWFC #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martonik
timelineItems.text: Rosales creates all the space + draws the defenders. Go pick him up — he mad that goal. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (45') | Un disparo desde fuera del área de Erick "Cubo" Torres rebota en un defensa y desvía la trayectoria para el #CHVvVAN 1-0

timelineItems.name: Jeff Bradley
timelineItems.text: Clean up on aisle 3. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! @erickestefano15 tallies on the stroke of halftime. 10-man @CDChivasUSA lead @WhitecapsFC 1-0. http://t.co/9jzZ8Xxp9t #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Province Sports
timelineItems.text: Like all Vancouver goalies, David Ousted learning about horror-show deflections from his own defenders.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Chivas USA 1, Vancouver Whitecaps 0.

timelineItems.name: Rudi Schuller
timelineItems.text: Completely uninspired first half from the Whitecaps against 10-man Chivas. Ugly stuff so far. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: BOTNSoccer
timelineItems.text: Surprised that Vancouver is not imposing in possession since going a man up. Credit Chivas for keeping the ball. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: stubhubexperience
timelineItems.text:
Go #ChivasUSA!
#stubhub #stubhubcenter #chivasvswhitecaps

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: Second half is underway! #ChivasUSA up by one. No subs from both sides.

timelineItems.name: Tyrel Tjoelker

timelineItems.text: Gotta love #MLS Last week Vancouver scored 4 on the Shield winners. This week they have 0 shots against 10 man Chivas USA. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.text:

timelineItems.text: Si je comprends bien, j'ai manqué les premières 45 minutes, je n'ai rien manqué finalement... #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.text: 59' Kekuta Manneh coming on for Nigel Reo-Coker. Awful display for Reo-Coker today. His giveaway led to Torres' goal. #WhitecapsFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Attempt missed. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Kenny Miller.

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA are about 30 minutes away from starting an #MLS season 2-0 for the first time since 2009 (when they went 3-0 to start season).

timelineItems.desc: Matias Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW: Laba pulls down Barrera

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martonik
timelineItems.text: Makes you wonder what this game would look like had CHV not lost a man so early. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Hand ball by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Larry W. Johnson
timelineItems.text: Wish we could have yesterday's #SEAvTOR match on this #CHVvVAN pitch - with this camera angle.

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: I was really hoping this season wasn't like last season when it comes to the Whitecaps playing at home compared to on the road. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Jonah Freedman
timelineItems.text: I really hope Cabrera's pregame scouting said, "We can crush their fullbacks." Because Rosales/Barrera having a field day out there #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Randip Janda
timelineItems.text: Up beat & positive play from Manneh on the wing taking on defenders. The #WhitecapsFC need more of that. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Pedro Morales with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Ngo
timelineItems.text: Good speed by Manneh and Mattocks but they can't seem to find each other. #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Naveed Parbakhsh
timelineItems.text: I never thought I would say this. But I think I am becoming a @cdchivasusa fan! Mcnamara is awesome! Love the hair. playin a man down #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Pedro Morales tries a through ball, but Kekuta Manneh is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: as it stands both #IMFC and #VWFC going down 1-0 on the road off of wickedly deflected goals - Caps have 25+ mins. to change that #MLS

timelineItems.name: Richard Baldry
timelineItems.text: Mattocks unable to believe he was onside there. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Thomas McNamara showing his versatility, as he's taken Pelletieri's place and is playing effectively as a holding midfielder right now.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Kennedy dives across goal to stop a curler from Manneh

timelineItems.name: From The Backline
timelineItems.text: Ugh, Rosales is annoying no matter what team he’s playing #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Chivas USA. Eric Avila tries a through ball, but Mauro Rosales is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Pedro Morales.
Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Erick Torres.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Rosales powers a shot just too high

timelineItems.name: Miguel
timelineItems.text: Chivas USA vs  Vancouver Whitecaps! Front row! #MLS #ChivasUSA #Whitecaps #Soccer #Corona

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: So when #ChivasUSA wins MLS Cup, does @thesoccerdon present the trophy to himself? #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.desc: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) is in on the edge of the box but Jay DeMerit makes a sliding tackle to deny him a chance at goal.
timelineItems.title: DeMerit makes an outstanding tackle to deny Torres a chance at goal

timelineItems.name: Jason Motz
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC would have no trouble scoring against ten-men squads if they sign #MiroslavKlose. #mls

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Bobby Burling with a headed pass.
Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mauro Rosales.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Jay DeMerit.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Manneh fires towards the top corner

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kenny Miller.

timelineItems.name: eric malebranche
timelineItems.text: #chvvvan MANNEH adding some spark to an otherwise dull and unimaginative effort. If only Mattocks could finish better

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Matthew Fondy (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Alex Schieferdecker
timelineItems.text: Vancouver has been playing like they've been a man down for the whole game. Constantly outnumbered everywhere. Makes 0 sense. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high.

timelineItems.name: Julian Dierkes
timelineItems.text: No, Hurtado for Fernandez. A statement that Robbo wants to win, I would say. Great! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Andrew Ngo
timelineItems.text: Hurtado in for Fernandez. Manneh just misses the top corner after. He's looked dangerous with a couple of chances already #VWFC #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Holly
timelineItems.text: You guys, it's Christian Dean. Big. Massive. Huge. Christian Dean. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Danny
timelineItems.text: @WhitecapsFC somebody scoooorrrrreeeee #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Blue Card Club
timelineItems.text: I hope Andy O'Brian put on some extra sunscreen today, looks like a sizzler out there. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Ngo
timelineItems.text: Christian Dean makes MLS debut coming in for O'Brien. California homecoming. Only 30 min from where he went to college #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 1, Vancouver Whitecaps 1. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Darren Mattocks.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Manneh times his run to finish off dangerous counter by Mattocks

timelineItems.name: Ryan Hildebrandt
timelineItems.text: Sorry, boys. 1 point won't be good enough today. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: nice work from Mattocks to find Manneh who has been electric with his speed since coming on 1-1 #CHVvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Now, that's not a good sub. Fragoso comes on and coughs it up. Great work from Mattocks to set up Manneh for a cool finish. 1-1. 82nd

timelineItems.name: Ken
timelineItems.text: That Whitecaps goal was all Darren mattocks...hope Kekuta gives him some thanks lol #vwfc

timelineItems.name: The Brabarian
timelineItems.text: Smart play by Mattocks, nice pass! Clinical finish by Kekuta. #ShowMeTheManneh #GoForTheWin #VWFC #Whitecaps

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Kenny Miller tries a through ball, but Darren Mattocks is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (81') | Kekutah Manneh empata el partido en la cabecera del área tras un centro de Darten Mattocks. #CHVvVAN 1-1

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Erik Hurtado tries a through ball, but Kenny Miller is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the center of the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Ousted with a fine stop on Erick Torres' header

timelineItems.name: Vancity Footy Fan
timelineItems.text: FINALLY. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Randip Janda
timelineItems.text: Both goals in the match have come from bad turnovers. The culprits: Reo-Coker & Fragoso #WhitecapsFC #ChivasUSA #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Matthew Fondy (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jay DeMerit (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! (80') Darren Mattocks bursts into the box and Kekuta Manneh finishes the feed. 1-1 between @WhitecapsFC + @ChivasUSA. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mauro Rosales.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! (80') Darren Mattocks bursts into the box and Kekuta Manneh finishes the feed. 1-1 between @WhitecapsFC + @CDChivasUSA. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Mauro Rosales.
Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Oswaldo Minda (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 85' Torres con un cabezazo a gol, pero Ousted con una GRAN atajada para #VWFC

timelineItems.name: bishopvillered
timelineItems.text: Hurtado with a few options, chooses none. #VWFC #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Jay Lahm
timelineItems.text: Mattocks can light up the assist chart this season if he continues to play up front #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Mattocks said the goals will come. Right now, it's the rest of his game doing the talking. #assist #CHVvVAN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Mercedes
timelineItems.text: Awwww Kekuta and Kris playing in the same MLS match!!! Warms my Aztex heart! #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: Also, @BlackArmy1850 is standing in sun in 90 degree heat wearing black T-shirts cheering on #chivasusa. Wow. #fanaticism

timelineItems.comment: Jordan Harvey (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Will it be yet another last minute goal? #mlsdrama #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.name: Jacob B.
timelineItems.text: It's a real testament to these teams that Darren Mattocks might not even have one of the 3 weirdest hairstyles in this game. #CHVvVAN

timelineItems.comment: Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Matthew Fondy (Chivas USA).
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Jay DeMerit tries a through ball, but Kekuta Manneh is caught offside.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Christian Dean.

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: Four minutes of added time! Game tied at 1-1 but Whitecaps have been applying the pressure. Youths with skills on the pitch!

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: Painful game to watch. Sigh, 1 point is better than none, but that should have been a guaranteed 3 points with Chivas down to 10. #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Chivas USA 1, Vancouver Whitecaps 1.
